hero.name: Dev
hero.role: AI/ML & Systems Engineer | Open Source Contributor
hero.tagline: Building secure systems, contributing to open infrastructure, and engineering production-grade software.

profile.shortBio: I am a B.Tech Computer Science (AI/ML) student focused on systems engineering, open source contribution, and production-ready software development.
profile.longBio: My work spans Bitcoin tooling, AI data infrastructure, distributed systems contributions, and full-stack platforms. I prioritize clean architecture, correctness, and real-world execution over theoretical discussions. I actively contribute to open source projects including SugarLabs, OWASP, CHAOSS, and DBpedia.

projects.title: BTC HashFrame
projects.description: Security-first Bitcoin QR encoding platform built with client-side cryptographic guarantees.
highlights: Implemented full client-side QR generation without server transmission
Added validation layer for BIP21, PSBT, descriptors
Built structured encoding engine with strict TypeScript typing
Added error correction and QR sizing control
Designed secure UI workflow to prevent accidental exposure

projects.title: SHINRA Labs
projects.description: AI Data Labeling Infrastructure Platform with task lifecycle management and marketplace model.
highlights: Modular frontend architecture using React + Vite
End-to-end task pipeline simulation for B2B AI use cases

openSource.summary: I contribute to system-level open source projects across Linux environments, networking infrastructure, security tooling, and distributed systems. My work focuses on reliability, bug fixes, system correctness, and real-world stability improvements.

organizations.name: SugarLabs
organizations.tagline: Linux Desktop Environment â€“ Python / GTK
organizations.role: Core contributor to Sugar Learning Environment.
contributions: Fixed datastore restart handling after DBus disconnect
Improved clipboard handling when multiple items exist
Journal UX fixes including range selection & search focus preservation
Control panel write optimization to reduce excessive disk writes
organizations.impact: Improved system stability, input reliability, and UI behavior across core desktop components.

organizations.name: BeagleBoard
contributions: Kernel-level and embedded system related improvements
Documentation and integration work across BeagleBoard ecosystem
organizations.impact: Low-level systems exposure, Linux-based hardware workflows, and embedded runtime understanding.

organizations.name: CHAOSS
organizations.impact: Improved robustness of open source health analytics tooling used across community metrics research.

organizations.name: OWASP
contributions: GitHub Actions workflow to prevent duplicate quality labels
organizations.impact: Improved contributor workflow hygiene and CI-based quality enforcement.
